```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```


```{r echo=FALSE}
library(ggcyto)
gs <- load_gs("/fh/fast/gottardo_r/mike_working/lyoplate_out//gated_data/auto/gslist-tcell/D54tFo7RPl/")
gs <- gs[1:2]
library(proto)
library(plyr)
source("~/rglab/workspace/ggcyto/R/ggcyto.R")
source("~/rglab/workspace/ggcyto/R/ggcyto-gs.R")
```

```{r}
p <- ggcyto(gs, parent = "CD3", aes(x = `CD4`, y = `CD8`)) 
# 2d plot
p1 <- p + geom_hex(bins = 128) + xlim(0,4096) + ylim(0,4096)
p1


# add gate
p1 <- p1 + geom_gate("CD4")
p1

# add stats
# p1 + geom_stats()

# add another gate
p1 + geom_gate("CD8")

# 1d plot

```
